text: Gumazim osɨmtɨziba aterɨva, egh uaghan osɨmtɨziba bar dar aven tugh gavgavigh, uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ateghan koghtɨ, God ivezir aghuim a danɨngtɨma a zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim iniam. Ivezir aghuir kam, God akar dɨkɨrɨzim gamua ghaze, gumazir bar a gifongeziba, a me danɨngam. Kamaghɨn, gumazir kam bar akongegh.
